title: Validate "Continue" and "Traffic Action" is mutually exclusive
custom_steps:
1. Create RT policy with DLP Profiles P1, P2
2. Select checkbox, "Set action for each profile"
3. Select Action as Alert for p1 and select action Add_headers for P2
4. Select "Add Traffic Action" and set action to "Alert" [if none of DLP match] 
5. There should not  "continue" checkbox available
custom_expected: There should not  "continue" checkbox available, when Traffic action is selected.
